casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joseph Burton MIAL 17P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Jospeh Burton Mial, for Mial, Joseph Burton Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

*600The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of January 2018 by Defendant for Preparation of Stenographic Transcript:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
